com.boomi.connector.workdayprism.requests

Class Requester

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.boomi.connector.workdayprism.requests.Requester
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnalyticsRequester, OpaRequester, TokenRequester

    public abstract class Requester
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract base class to define and execute request to the Workday Prism API
    Author:
    juan.paccapelo

      • doRequest

        public <T> T doRequest(java.lang.Class<T> responseType)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Executes requests to the destination API. Depending on the RetryStrategy passed to the construction of this class, this method will retry the request, setting a new authorization header every time.
        Parameters:
        responseType - specifies the expected response type.
        Returns:
        an instance of the type provided as a parameter.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there's a communication problem while the request is executed.
        com.boomi.connector.api.ConnectorException - if there the response does not matches the expected status and content.

      • doRequest

        public PrismResponse doRequest()
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Executes requests to the destination API. Depending on the RetryStrategy passed to the construction of this class, this method will retry the request, setting a new authorization header every time.
        Returns:
        a PrismResponse instance.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there's a communication problem while the request is executed.

      • executeRequest

        public org.apache.http.client.methods.CloseableHttpResponse executeRequest()
                                                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
